titleStmt.title: Doctor Chamberlain visited with a bunch of his own grapes, gathered out of his own packet of letters: to know whether my answer to his question gave satisfaction, and that by his reply to partake of those rare gifts of the spirit, which he proffered to publish in Black-fryers Church. Also an answer to Dr Chamberlains reply, concerning sprinkling the baptized. / By Thomas Bakewel.
titleStmt.author: Bakewell, Thomas, b. 1618 or 19.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Dallam, and are to be sold at his shop in Black-fryers neer Carter-lane,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Chamberlen, Peter. To my beloved friends and neighbours of the Black-Fryers.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Black-fryers neer Carter-lane
